channel.title: Smf question
channel.description: Ok i recently bought a godaddy host, and got smf installed.. well i was wondering what is the package name for the Pokemon images under the user groups?

item.title: Smf question
item.dc:creator: @masta_XY masta XY
item.description:
@masta_XY wrote:

[quote=“chassy13, post:10, topic:257010”][quote author=ThAt0n36Uy link=topic=339377.msg2632229#msg2632229 date=1232253203]
You know your website is going to suck and no one will go there because of the other 20,000 websites devoted to private servers, right? You should just give up now.
[/quote]

What does that have to do with anything? His forums could be for his server. You can edit the MoparScape icons before uploading them…[/quote]

I already did all that lol… and it is for my server, i dont give a crap about other community’s… I rather have mine with people I know. and not over 700 inactive people that join and dont post… A site can get big with only 30 people that post… then a site with 3000 people that dont post or log on.

Read full topic

item.title: Smf question
item.dc:creator: @masta_XY masta XY
item.description:
@masta_XY wrote:

[quote=“sanga282, post:7, topic:257010”][quote author=chassy13 link=topic=339377.msg2631855#msg2631855 date=1232229279]
Just save MoparScape’s and then use an image replacer for one of the existing group images (Google this…) and paste the code in your Headers/Footers.
[/quote]
smfforfree faggot
you get the smf mod that allows multiple badges, then you upload the images to the themes/default/images directory and you can choose usergroups to have those images and then click show as secondary[/quote]
thanks, and i found the mod and now i am uploading them.

Read full topic

item.title: Smf question
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

chassy13:

Just save MoparScape’s and then use an image replacer for one of the existing group images (Google this…) and paste the code in your Headers/Footers.

smfforfree faggot
you get the smf mod that allows multiple badges, then you upload the images to the themes/default/images directory and you can choose usergroups to have those images and then click show as secondary

Read full topic
